item.description:
Come on out and join us for glow bowling with good friends.

It's the monthly bowling time again as you know we will bowl out to some great tunes, glow and have fun with friends!

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can give your dues to me at any event.  Thank you!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

Looking forward to seeing you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside at the tables, or if you are running late then come on in to the glow area and find us!
item.name: Glow Bowling @ Metro Bowl
